name: roblox-ts-template
description: A comprehensive, production-ready template for building Roblox experiences with TypeScript

scripts.docker:dev: docker compose up -d roblox-ts-dev || docker-compose up -d roblox-ts-dev
scripts.docker:test: docker compose run --rm roblox-ts-test || docker-compose run --rm roblox-ts-test
scripts.docker:build-project: docker compose run --rm roblox-ts-build || docker-compose run --rm roblox-ts-build
scripts.docker:lint: docker compose run --rm roblox-ts-lint || docker-compose run --rm roblox-ts-lint
scripts.docker:shell: docker compose exec roblox-ts-dev bash || docker-compose exec roblox-ts-dev bash
scripts.docker:logs: docker compose logs -f roblox-ts-dev || docker-compose logs -f roblox-ts-dev
scripts.docker:clean: (docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f) || (docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f)
